name: Sparky
description: Sparky is an osciloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a sleek metal body resembling a cat, Sparky is equipped with four foundry arms and legs that allow it to move with agility. Its screen displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, captivating anyone who gazes upon it. To enhance its functionality, Sparky wears a pair of high-tech glasses that provide it with advanced vision capabilities. Its unique combination of traits and accessories make Sparky a valuable asset in the world of technology and exploration.
